author: mikemccand
msg: LUCENE-2217: cutover more places where arrays grow to ArrayUtil.oversize/grow

author: antelder
msg: Start exploring using the Hazelcast native client so that the SCAClient API can use this when the client is in a separate JVM from the Tuscany domain without having to use a full blown distributed endpoint registry which avoids all the sync and lifecycle issues

author: julianfoad
msg: Teach davautocheck.sh to run individual tests even when the build dir is not
Set ABS_SRCDIR to the root of the source tree that this script is in. When
not running a whole "make check", use ABS_SRCDIR rather than ABS_BUILDDIR
to locate the Python test script to run.
